articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Death rates are rising in young adults in Eastern Europe - politico.eu
articles.description: Increasing mental health disorders are among the “concerning” trends in the Global Burden of Disease report.
articles.content:
In Eastern Europe, the largest increases in mortality were among those aged 15-19 year and 20-24 years, with rates increasing by 54 percent and 40 percent, respectively, between 2011 and 2023.
